name: FltCacheCheck
desc: when airline is KLM and flt departure is within 3 to 7 days of booking
when: Pogo.AirlineCode == "KL" && FltSearchRequest.DepartureDateTime > Pogo.AddDays(Pogo.BookingTime, 3) && FltSearchRequest.DepartureDateTime < Pogo.AddDays(Pogo.BookingTime, 7) && Pogo.FromCache == false
